sn35.152:4.1: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
sn35.152:4.3: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
sn35.152:4.4: ‘dukkhassa kho, āvuso, pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti.
sn35.152:4.5: Sace pana vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
sn35.152:4.6: ‘katamaṃ panāvuso, dukkhaṃ, yassa pariññāya samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti?
sn35.152:4.7: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
sn35.152:5.9: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhaṃ;
sn35.152:5.10: tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati … pe …
sn35.152:5.14: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhaṃ;
sn35.152:5.18: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyāthā”ti.
